title: 1963 Corvette Built Right - /MATT FARAH
description:
If you love cars, want to buy a cool used one, or just browse the internet seeing what's out there, you need to know about the site Bring A Trailer. 

They scour the internet looking for the best cool used cars, projects, and collectibles. They've even developed their own bidding software that gets rid of people who "snipe" online car auctions. They're some of the best brains in the car business. 

So when they build a car, you can bet it's special. This is their 1963 split window Corvette.
tags: Chevy Corvette, 1963 Corvette Split window, Corvette C2
